version_description:
All of our weekly updates include performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions through our in-app support in Settings – we'd love to hear from you.

Calendar attachments are now available in Outlook. View inline images and open attachments right from the event details.

All of our weekly updates also include performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you.

我们的所有每周更新都包括性能改进及 Bug 修复，以便为用户提供更好的 Outlook 体验。

欢迎随时通过“设置”中的应用内支持，向我们发送任何意见或问题，我们非常乐意听取你的宝贵意见。

从侧边栏访问所有最喜爱 Outlook 文件夹、人员和组。还可直接从侧边栏或者从联系人或组卡片添加或删除收藏夹。

此外，每周更新均包含性能改进和 bug 修复，借以改善用户的 Outlook 体验。

This update includes performance improvements and bug fixes to make Outlook better for you. This release also fixes an issue that some users encountered that was causing them to see message send errors after the message was sent successfully.

Catch someone's attention with @mentions. When you @mention someone in an email, their full name will be displayed and highlighted. Simply tap backspace to shorten to their first name and make it more personal.

You don’t have to dim the lights to love Dark Mode. Every detail has been designed and engineered to help you be even more productive where you couldn't before. Our true black colour palette takes full advantage of your OLED screens so your eyes can rest easy and you can go about your day or night without worrying about battery life. Find it in Settings under Preferences. This feature is slowly rolling out so you might not see it straight away.

Sick of that company-wide email that everyone is still replying all to? So are we. Stay focused on what\'s important by getting it and all future replies out of your inbox and straight into deleted items with our new Ignore Conversation feature.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions through our in-app support in Settings – we’d love to hear from you.

此更新包括性能改进和 bug 修复，旨在提升你的 Outlook 体验。

请随时通过访问“设置”>“帮助和反馈”向我们发送任何评论或问题 - 我们乐意收到你的反馈。

Outlook helps you stay on top of forthcoming meetings by highlighting relevant documents and slides.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

始终掌控你的任务! 可在“搜索”主页上找到排名前三的任务，并直接在 Outlook 中将其标记为“已完成”。在微软待办中点击任务来执行更多操作。

请随时通过访问“设置”>“帮助和反馈”向我们发送任何评论或问题 - 我们乐意收到你的反馈。

发现可疑内容? 举报垃圾邮件和网络钓鱼邮件，确保收件箱安全。找到新增的“报告垃圾邮件”选项，在此位置还可以找到其他操作，如“存档”和“删除”。Office 365 和 Outlook.com 帐户均提供该选项。

随时可转到“设置” > “帮助和反馈”，向我们发送评论或问题 – 我们非常乐意听取你的意见。

发现可疑内容? 举报垃圾邮件和网络钓鱼邮件，确保收件箱安全。找到新增的“报告垃圾邮件”选项，在此位置还可以找到其他操作，如“存档”和“删除”。Office 365 和 Outlook.com 帐户均提供该选项。

轻松分辨所有帐户之间的区别! 现在，当撰写电子邮件或创建新的日历活动时，我们将在标题中显示帐户图标。

Split your view and maximise your productivity. Now you can attach files and images by dragging and dropping them from OneDrive, Files, Photos, Safari, and Outlook email attachments when using split view on iPad. You can also drag and drop contacts from Search to the recipients list.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.

iOS 14 is out, and Outlook is ready. In Settings, you can set Outlook as your default email client so it will automatically handle email links from other apps. We've got new Calendar widgets that you can add directly to your home screen. With WatchOS 7, we've updated our calendar complication, a new email complication with unread count is coming soon. On iPad, you can scribble with your Apple Pencil to quickly compose messages, search, or add details.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we\’d love to hear from you.

Outlook is making it easier to identify emails from senders outside your organisation to protect against spam & phishing threats. If admin configured, there will be a new external label on emails and the sender's email address can be viewed by tapping the external label at the top of the email.

Feel free to send us any comments or questions by going to Settings > Help & Feedback – we’d love to hear from you.
